bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an inclination of one’s leg to break regardless of whether it is winter or summer. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 屍脚者，脚跟坼破之名也 , 亦是冬時觸犯寒氣所以然。 又言脚踏死屍所臥地，亦令脚坼破 , “As for corpse leg , this is the designation of a fractured leg or heel. It may also be that [a leg] was struck by cold qi in winter. It is also said that stepping on the ground where a corpse had been lying causes a leg to fracture”.
